apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, depicting a kiss between two people with light and medium-light skin tones, shines on Apple devices with a heartwarming glow and soft, rounded contours. Apple's signature 3D shading and realistic lighting lend a gentle intimacy to the embrace, capturing a moment of affection and connection. The smooth gradients and subtle highlights convey warmth and tenderness, making it an ideal choice for expressing love, romance, or deep platonic fondness in messages shared on Apple devices.
